newsitem.title: ESTONIA: SAKU TO PAY ONE KROON PER SHARE DIVIDEND.
newsitem.headline: SAKU TO PAY ONE KROON PER SHARE DIVIDEND.

text.p: Saku brewery said on Tuesday that their share holders meeting decided the company will pay a dividend of one kroon per share or eight million kroons and 6.5 million kroons will be paid into the company's reserve capital.
Saku, listed on the free market of stock exchange, also said the shareholders approved the company's financial statement with a profit of 27.3 million kroon for 1996.
